references: Related: CF 253218. Amending: Ord 86300, Ord 89859, Ord 92886, Ord 91138, Ord 91700, Ord 92492, Ord 88283.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning and amending Sections 2.3, 2.4, 3.02, 3.04, 3.17, 3.20, 3.23, 3.27, 4.1, 16.1, 16.2, 16.3, 16.4, 16.5, 16.6, 16.7, 17.1, 17.2, 17.3, 17.4, 17.5, 17.6, 17.7, 18.2, 23.1, 24.6, and repealing Section 27.4 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300), and adding thereto new sections designated 17A.1, 17A.2, 17A.3, 17A.4, 17A.5, 17A.6 and 17A.7 to implement the Comprehensive Plan heretofore adopted for the Central Business District.
